attributes.action: Invest the money raised from 'Green Tax' in to green projects I.E. creation of Bio-Fules
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more taxes are being described as 'Green Tax' but the government fails to say how they are spending the money raised to combat climate change. The government should be investing this money in the development and supply of Bio-Fuels and also Rain Forrest conservation instead of allowing MP's to take the micky on expenses I.E. £20k for new kitchen
